headline: Middleburg and Capital City Real Estate Close on Prime Fairfax Land Parcel for 260-Unit Luxury Multifamily Development
summary: VIENNA, Va., August 13, 2025--Middleburg, a leading developer of rental housing throughout the Southeast and Sunbelt, today announced the closing of a Co-GP development with Capital City Real Estate. The partnership has secured land and financing for The Botanist, a 260-unit luxury Class A multifamily community strategically located at 10350 Eaton Place in Fairfax, Virginia.

headline: Saudi Arabia Circuit Breaker Market Outlook and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring ABB, Alstom, Eaton, General Electric, Schneider Electric, Siemens, Camsco, G&W, Kirloskar, Larsen & Toubro
summary: The Saudi Arabia Circuit Breaker Market is projected to rise to US$ 152.32 million by 2033 from US$ 88.79 million in 2024, growing at a CAGR of 6.18% from 2025 to 2033. This growth is influenced by rapid urbanization, increasing power demand, and investments in smart grids and renewable energy. Circuit breakers offer essential power distribution and safety for residential, commercial, industrial, and utility applications.
